title: Construction Industry Safety Virtual Class: Fall Prevention Education Based on Multiple Intelligence Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Safety Regulations and Work Processes in Construction Sites
context.additional_context: Primarily asynchronous learning via an online platform, offering three 30-minute modules per week.

learning_goals: Identify three or more types of fall accidents occurring at construction sites and analyze risk factors
Achieve a safety response score of 85% or higher in interactive simulations designed according to multiple intelligence types

Learners can categorize the procedures for using fall protection equipment (safety belts, lanyards, anchors, etc.) into five steps according to EU construction industry safety standards (EN 363, EN 353-1, etc.) and explain the core safety rules for each step with at least 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
